title.title: UBUD VILLAGE AND TANAH LOT TOUR
title.text: UBUD VILLAGE AND TANAH LOT TOUR
title.html: UBUD VILLAGE AND TANAH LOT TOUR

tagline.title: FULL DAY UBUD VILLAGE AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS ONE DAY TRIP FOR EXPLORE TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE AND THEN SEE VIEW BREATHTAKING VIEW SUNSET AT TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.text: FULL DAY UBUD VILLAGE AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS ONE DAY TRIP FOR EXPLORE TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE AND THEN SEE VIEW BREATHTAKING VIEW SUNSET AT TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.html: FULL DAY UBUD VILLAGE AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS ONE DAY TRIP FOR EXPLORE TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE AND THEN SEE VIEW BREATHTAKING VIEW SUNSET AT TANAH LOT TEMPLE

description.text: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour is a one day tourist trip to see the beauty of the tourist destination in Ubud village and continue to enjoy the beauty of the sunset at Tanah Lot Temple. We have designed and designed tour packages for those of you who want to see the highlights of Ubud and Tanah Lot villages in one day. The trip starts in the morning, where our tour driver will pick you up at the hotel you are staying at, make sure you have eaten breakfast beforehand, the first destination will be to visit Tegenungan waterfall which is a natural tourist spot to see the beauty of the waterfall in Ubud village, after that continue to Tegalalang rice terrace to see the beauty of the rice fields with terraces which are often very enchanting, continue to visit the Ubud Monkey Forest, a natural tourist spot where we will visit a small forest with a habitat for tame monkeys and see the beauty of the unspoiled forest, continue to the restaurant to enjoy lunch with delicious Indonesian food, after lunch the journey continues to Taman Ayun Temple to see the beauty of the temple with its enchanting garden and see the holy place for Hindus here, continue to Tanah Lot Temple to see the beauty of the sunset on the beach and see The uniqueness of Tanah Lot Temple is located on a rock on the beach. After that we will take you back to the hotel you are staying at with a very impressive experience on a one day trip to Ubud and Tanah Lot, the trip will be even more enjoyable with our professional and friendly driver.

After that we will take you back to the hotel you are staying at with a very impressive experience on a one day trip to Ubud and Tanah Lot, the trip will be even more enjoyable with our professional and friendly driver.

title.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Tegenungan Waterfall

image.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Ubud Tegenungan Waterfall | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegenungan Waterfall is located in Banjar Tegenungan, Kemenuh Village, Sukawati District, Gianyar Regency, Bali. Typical scene around Tegenungan Waterfall is genuinely delightful, with green trees and beautiful. Near to the waterfall has been produced with a couple shower showers from normal springs. A tourist spot that offers a very beautiful view of the waterfall and this tourist spot is very popular among tourists, which makes this place never empty of visitors. If you want to go down to get to the waterfall location, you need very good stamina, because you will go down about 150 steps, but if you just want to see the view, we can look from the top, there is a spot to see the view of the waterfall in full. Overall, a very enchanting natural tourist spot and very suitable to visit before going to Tanah Lot Temple to see the sunset

title.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Tegalalang Rice Terrace

image.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Ubud Tegallalang Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is a tourist spot to see views of the rice fields that form terraces often in Tegalalang village, northern Ubud. Tegallalang rice terrace is designed very beautiful with exquisite hollowing rice field and precisely located on the hill bank This tourist spot is visited very often because of its strategic location on the side of the main road, so many tourists stop to take photos of the beauty of the rice fields. There are also many other interesting activities here besides views of the rice fields, for example swings, short trekking and restaurants with views of the rice fields. Although this rice field is not very big, it offers views of the expanse of rice fields, coconut trees and a small river as a place for watering the rice fields, a very suitable place for you to visit before heading to the Tanah Lot Temple.

title.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Ubud Monkey Forest

image.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Monkey Forest is a tourist attraction located in Ubud village, precisely in the center of Ubud city, a small forest with a nature reserve temple complex in Ubud Bali, this small forest is inhabited by hundreds of local monkeys with the name Wanara, the monkeys here are very tame because they are managed by local village where they are given food every day so they don't get aggressive, apart from the monkeys you can see the beauty of nature which is still very natural, there are lots of shady trees here and there are also several holy places here that you can see such as Pura Dalem Agung Padang Tegal, Pura Beji and Pura Prajapati, and also in every corner there are officers guarding them at all times so that the monkeys do not disturb the tourists. So it is a suitable place for you to visit before heading to Tanah Lot Temple

title.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Taman Ayun Temple

image.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Taman Ayun Temple is located in Mengwi District, Badung, Bali, Indonesia. This park and Taman Ayun Temple are historical relics of the Mengwi kingdom. Taman Ayun Temple is a very beautiful temple, this is true to its name which means temple in a beautiful garden. The Taman Ayun Temple area has a panoramic view of the kingdom, a water park and fresh air. Being in this place, tourists will experience the heyday of the Mengwi Kingdom. Taman Ayun Temple is also considered to have historical values, which makes the regional government of Bali suggest the UNESCO in 2002 that this temple is included in the World Heritage List. This tourist spot is very often visited by tourists before heading to Tanah Lot Temple, because it is a beautiful tourist spot with beautiful and stunning gardens, and temple buildings full of historical value

title.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Tanah Lot Temple

image.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour | Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tanah Lot Temple is a holy place for Hindus located in Kediri village, Tabanan Regency, this place is often visited by tourists who want to see the beautiful sunset at this place. Tanah Lot Temple was built to worship the god of the sea, namely Dewa Baruna. Tanah Lot has its own uniqueness which makes this tourist spot very famous and popular among tourists, where we can see this uniqueness from the location where this temple stands, which is located on a rock on the beach, and when the sea water is high, this temple will be like floating in the ocean, and it's not wrong if this temple has another name among tourists, namely Floating Temple in the sea, besides that, the Tanah Lot tourist spot is very suitable for those of you who want to enjoy the sunset, because the sunset view from this place is very beautiful and very enchanting

price.title: Ubud and Tanah Lot Price :
price.content:
Ubud and Tanah Lot Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of West Bali Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 650,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 950,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 800,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
